titleStmt.title: The sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the tenth day of Nouember being the next Sunday after the discouerie of this late horrible treason. By the right reuerend father in God, William, by Gods permission, Lord Bishop of Rochester.
titleStmt.author: Barlow, William, d. 1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. VV[indet] for Mathew Law,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
